===Etymology 2===
{{zh-forms|s=乌鲁木齐|gloss=-|alt=烏漉木製,烏櫓莫濟,烏鹵沐齊,烏鹵沐債,烏魯沐債,烏漉沐漬}}
Unclear. Here are a few possibilities:
* {{lang|zh|烏魯木齊}}: Since the Min Nan area and Ürümqi are very far apart, if someone claims to be from or went to Ürümqi, they are speaking nonsense.
* {{lang|zh|烏漉木製}}: There is a type of wood called {{lang|zh|烏漉木}}, which is of very bad quality. If furniture is made from it, it is made carelessly.
* {{lang|zh|烏櫓莫濟}}: From {{zh-l|*烏|to not have}} + {{zh-l|*櫓|scull}} + {{zh-l|*莫|do not}} + {{zh-l|*濟|to cross a river}}, literally "to not have a scull to cross a river", used figuratively to mean "to not have the main thing to do the job; to be careless".

====Pronunciation====
{{zh-pron

|cat=id
}}

# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to be [[careless]]; to be in a [[mess]]; to [[talk]] [[nonsense]]
